title: Made You Look: A True Story About Fake Art
description:
Tig and Cheryl are the real deal, unlike the story profiled in "Made You Look," a captivating true crime doc about fake art sold for millions of dollars! Plus, Cheryl tells a story about bringing an Irish stew to a multicultural celebration, and Tig clues her in that maybe a certain gym teacher wasn't such a fan of her cuisine after all. *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
